recommended_degree: Administrasi BIsnis, Administrasi Bisnis Terapan, Akuntansi, Akuntansi Manajemen, Manajemen Administrasi Perkantoran (Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Sorting Packing List for Monthly Invoice
2. Compile PO and other supporting document for invoicing
3. Create Receipt, input attention & service instruction
4. Create Invoice & e-Tax invoice
5. Matching, Create Invoice, E-Tax, Create Receipt etc. for Monthly Billing
6. Follow up Invoice/GR/PL/PO Issue to Customer
7.  Maintain List Invoice & E-Tax Number
8. Read and Reply email.

Work location : Jababeka, Cikarang Bekasi
